hiveArticle.title: My photography - Water candles (Original) 水蜡烛
hiveArticle.body:
In a pond, I see a lot of these plants like ham sausage, approached to see, and looks like a candle, back home search the information, this plant called Po rod [pú bàng], with anti-inflammatory hemostasis effect, commonly used In the Trauma bleeding, antibacterial swelling, treatment of trauma to stop bleeding, I picked some my favorite photos,Together to enjoy！ 我在一个水塘，看到许多长得很像火腿肠的植物，走近看，又长得像蜡烛，查了下资料，这种植物叫蒲棒[pú bàng]，具有消炎止血之功效, 常用于外伤出血, 抑菌退肿,治创伤止血, 所有图像拍摄Iphone6，挑选了一些照片，希望大家喜欢. **** http://steemit.marketing/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/IMG_7958.jpg
